Robert Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says.`` Being mean was what made him a celebrity. When its first minivans hit the market in 1983, Chrysler caught its competitors by surprise- and that's just what Sergio Marchionne hopes to do with its next-generation vans. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of[ the minivan] segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers yesterday at Chrysler's Windsor Assembly Plant, where both the Chrysler Town& Country and title="Dodge" href="http://rumors.automobilemag.com/manufacturer/dodge/"> Dodge Grand Caravan are built.
